title: 怎么让物品右键就会获得权限

replies.txt_content:
下载RPGitem，
教程：[指令|文图|插件|RPGItem][PCD] 创造你的RPG物品吧!详细教程
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=665464

右键获得权限：/rpgitem ID power command 冷却 描述 '指令'*

replies.author: Cassius_Zdq
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 9003&highlight=指令

这个插件可以帮助你

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... B61%5D%5Btype%5D%3D

指令那里写↓
   - manuaddp %玩家% xxxx复制代码
xxxx是权限
